column6:
Whew, that all-Cyclops issue was a little heavy, huh? Let's pick things up with a story that makes the X-Men-go-into-the-Professor's-Head issue look tame. Because our five exceptional students are about to meet the enigmatic MYSTERIO. ,2008,4
Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | artist:Nick Dragotta | penciller (cover):Carlo Pagualyan | writer:Jeff Parker | letterer:Nate Piekos | colorist:Val Staples
